attributes.additional_details:
Treehouse Nursery School requires your support to refurbish and transform Wanstead Park Playground (Woodbine Place). Some of the equipment in the playground dates back to 1980’s. We would like to create a spectacular adventure play area for children  of all ages, special needs and the community to add value to the area.

We would like London Borough of Redbridge to fund the new playground to enhance the quality of life for the children.
